tooltip.spawnegg: Left click an entity to save it. Shift while doing saves nbt too.
tooltip.spawnegg.creative: Needs to be in creative mode to copy entity
tooltip.armor: Right click an entity to edit their equipment
tooltip.army.first: Right click block to set first, and then second corner of the box
tooltip.army.second: Right click into air to to add entities in the box to the team with the name of this item (if exists, else DEFAULT)
tooltip.army.forth: Left click to add entities to the team with the name of this item (if exists, else DEFAULT)
tooltip.army.fifth: Use vanilla /team command to show/change team color
tooltip.army.add.box: Added entities in the box to team %s
tooltip.effect.remove: Left click an entity to remove their potion effects
tooltip.effect.give.first: Left click an entity to remove their potion effects
tooltip.effect.give.second: Left click an entity to remove their potion effects
tooltip.effect.give.add: Added effect %1$s with amplifier %2$s for %3$s ticks
tooltip.equip.first: Right click block to set first, and then second corner of the box
tooltip.equip.second: Right click into air to to make entities able to pickup items
tooltip.equip.box.add: Entities in box can now pickup items
tooltip.group.second: Right click on entity to set the target
tooltip.heal: Left click on entity to heal it
tooltip.kill: Left click on entity to kill it
tooltip.mount.first: Left click an entity to select
tooltip.mount.second: Left click another entity to add selected entity as rider
tooltip.stick.first: Left click to asign an entity
tooltip.stick.add: First entity set, hit another entity to set target
